31 Dec: 1 Jan 2023 to 31 Dec 2023 as the fund meets the conditions for the income tax concession at the last day of their preceding financial year (31 Dec 2022).As a concession, the GST incurred from 1 Jul 2022 to 31 Dec 2022 can be claimed, but only after the fund established that it meets the conditions for the income tax concession as at 31 Dec 2022.
31 Dec.1: 1 Jan 2023 to 31 Dec 2023 as the fund meets the conditions for the income tax concession at the last day of their preceding financial year (31 Dec 2022).As a concession, the GST incurred from 1 Jul 2022 to 31 Dec 2022 can be claimed, but only after the fund established that it meets the conditions for the income tax concession as at 31 Dec 2022.
